description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Aug-25 07:26:44

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

LastDtc_BusId.description: The Bus ID of the Asset / Truck CAN Bus where the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) was raised.

LastDtc_NodeAddress.description: The Controller Node Address of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Node Address is reported by CAN Open and Zapi DTC formats.

LastDtc_ErrorCode.description: The Error Code of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Error Code is reported by CAN Open and Zapi DTC formats.

LastDtc_ServiceMeter.description: Units: Seconds. The service meter at the time of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

LastDtc_Fmi.description: The FMI (Failure Mode Identifier) of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. FMI is reported by J1939 DTC format.

LastDtc_OccurrenceCount.description: The Occurrence Count of the last DTC (diagnostic trouble code) detected on the Asset / Truck CAN Bus. Occurrence Count is reported by J1939 and C29 DTC formats.
